Bhupinder,

The library files should be in your

  cantera\build\lib\i686-p=
c-win32d

directory.

They should get compiled there. What I do is
double c=
lick on 'cantera.sln' in the 

   cantera\win32\vc7

dir, then do a Build -=
> Build Solution.
